definitions: The action of forming fabric by interlacing long threads passing in one direction with others at a right angle to them.
The action of making a complex or intricate pattern or object from separate parts by interlacing them.
The action of moving in an intricate or sinuous way from side to side.
examples: She is weaving a beautiful tapestry.
The spider was weaving its web.
He was weaving through traffic on his bicycle.
